import prodtctOverlay14 from "../../../assets/images/shop/product/s-14.jpg"; import prodtctOverlay15 from "../../../assets/images/shop/product/s-15.jpg"; class ShopProductList extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { wishlistModal: false, pathItems: [ //id must required { id: 1, name: "Landrick", link: "/index" }, { id: 2, name: "Shop", link: "#" }, { id: 3, name: "Products" }, ], products: [ { id: 1, image: product1, imgOverlay: prodtctOverlay1, name: "Branded T-Shirt", price: "16.00", oldPrice: "21.00", isFeatures: true, desc: 'This is required when, for example, the final text is not yet available. Dummy text is also known as "fill text".', }, { id: 2, image: product2, imgOverlay: prodtctOverlay2, name: "Shopping Bag", price: "21.00", oldPrice: "25.00", isNew: true, isFeatures: true, isSale: true, isOutofStock: true, desc: 'This is required when, for example, the final text is not yet available. Dummy text is also known as "fill text".', }, { id: 3, image: product3, imgOverlay: prodtctOverlay3, name: "Elegent Watch", price: "5.00", sucessPrice: "30% off", isSale: true, desc: 'This is required when, for example, the final text is not yet available. Dummy text is also known as "fill text".', }, { id: 4, image: product4, imgOverlay: prodtctOverlay4, name: "Casual Shoes", price: "18.00", oldPrice: "22.00", isNew: true, isFeatures: true, isSale: true, desc: 'This is required when, for example, the final text is not yet available. Dummy text is also known as "fill text".', }, { id: 5, image: product5, imgOverlay: prodtctOverlay5, name: "Earphones", price: "3.00", }, { id: 6, image: product6, imgOverlay: prodtctOverlay6, name: "Elegent Mug", price: "4.50", oldPrice: "6.50", isOutofStock: true, desc: 'This is required when, for example, the final text is not yet available. Dummy text is also known as "fill text".', }, { id: 7, image: product7, imgOverlay: prodtctOverlay7, name: "Sony Headphones", price: "9.99", sucessPrice: "20% off", desc: "20% off", }, { id: 8, image: product8, imgOverlay: prodtctOverlay8, name: "Wooden Stools", price: "22.00", oldPrice: "25.00", isSale: true, desc: 'This is required when, for example, the final text is not yet available. Dummy text is also known as "fill text".', }, { id: 9, image: product9, imgOverlay: prodtctOverlay9, name: "Coffee Cup / Mug", price: "16.00", oldPrice: "21.00", desc: 'This is required when, for example, the final text is not yet available. Dummy text is also known as "fill text".', }, { id: 10, image: product10, imgOverlay: prodtctOverlay10, name: "Sunglasses", price: "5.00", oldPrice: "25.00", isNew: true, desc: 'This is required when, for example, the final text is not yet available. Dummy text is also known as "fill text".', }, { id: 11, image: product11, imgOverlay: prodtctOverlay11, name: "Loafer Shoes", price: "22.00", desc: "30% off", }, { id: 12, image: product12, imgOverlay: prodtctOverlay12, name: "T-Shirts", price: "22.00", oldPrice: "25.00", desc: 'This is required when, for example, the final text is not yet available. Dummy text is also known as "fill text".', }, { id: 13, image: product13, imgOverlay: prodtctOverlay13, name: "Wooden Chair", price: "16.00", oldPrice: "21.00", desc: 'This is required when, for example, the final text is not yet available. Dummy text is also known as "fill text".', }, { id: 14, image: product14, imgOverlay: prodtctOverlay14, name: "Women Block Heels", price: "21.00", oldPrice: "25.00", isNew: true, isFeatures: true, isSale: true, desc: 'This is required when, for example, the final text is not yet available. Dummy text is also known as "fill text".', }, { id: 15, image: product15, imgOverlay: prodtctOverlay15, name: "T-Shirts", price: "22.00", desc: "30% off", }, ], topProducts: [ { image: product1, name: "T-Shirt", oldPrice: "$22.00", NewPrice: "$18.00 ", }, { image: product3, name: "Watch", oldPrice: "$22.00", NewPrice: "$18.00 ", }, { image: product6, name: "Coffee Cup", oldPrice: "$22.00", NewPrice: "$18.00 ", }, { image: product8, name: "Wooden Stools", oldPrice: "$22.00", NewPrice: "$18.00 ", }, ], }; this.toggle.bind(this); } toggle = () => { this.setState((prevState) => ({ wishlistModal: !prevState.wishlistModal, })); }; componentDidMount() { window.addEventListener("scroll", this.scrollNavigation, true); } // Make sure to remove the DOM listener when the component is unmounted. componentWillUnmount() { window.removeEventListener("scroll", this.scrollNavigation, true); } scrollNavigation = () => { var doc = document.documentElement; var top = (window.pageYOffset || doc.scrollTop) - (doc.clientTop || 0); if (top > 80) { document.getElementById("topnav").classList.add("nav-sticky"); } else { document.getElementById("topnav").classList.remove("nav-sticky"); } }; render() { return ( {/* breadcrumb */}
